referenceObject.reference: Dimitrov, D., Bolzern, A. & Arnedo, M. A. (2022). Bringing Tegenaria boitanii stat. rev. back to life with a review of the Tegenaria percuriosa-complex (Araneae: Agelenidae), description of a new species and insight into their phylogenetic relationships and evolutionary history. Systematics and Biodiversity 20(1): 1-18.
